I've neglected poor innocent Daytum... I'm so bad at being consistent.
I have pain... throbbing (simultaneously) in the arch of my right foot and on my right side, 6 inches down from my armpit. Very odd.
And I also wish that Last.fm would partner with Facebook.
I wish google owned Flickr. =[
Moving all my feeds from Newsfire into Google Reader. This is part of packing, too, because I only plan on bringing my iPhone to AZ. No comp
Packing right now is less about trying to transport my belongings somewhere, but what kind of person I'm going to be where I'm going.
Packing. And I found my wallet in the inside pocket of one of my blazers. The nice one. It's the only designer thing I own (Christian Dior)
Thinking of taking a walk in the rain.
I just found myself laughing and saying outloud "yeah that's really weird" to myself. Reading blogs. Whatever.
I love showers. I would like to sleep soon but I dunno if it'll happen.
Gonna take a shower...
And thank you to @scanner_darkly and @safetyguy1656 for the happy birthdays. I missed 'em somehow.
@allanlasser I'm glad you like it. Funnily enough Subump is the most recent, and kind of the one I'm personally happiest with.
My album's done. http://ejfox.com/ateteen/
Other mac mini reads the external HD with no discernable trouble. So I guess my intel mini is freaking. Reinstall OS? Wait for leopard?
Backing up Art Portfolio to other computer, and I'll probably burn it too. This computer is bite-bite-biting the dust, SOS!
Grandma ordered me a Timbuk2 messenger bag. Sweet. Getting tired of the backpack I'm using now, it's one big hard-to-organize compartment.
Grandma's here with some presents; magazines, books, junk food. Excellent.
Why am I up now? What purpose does this serve? I guess it's just for old times' sake. My alarm clock just went off...
